sections.title: Key responsibilities:
content: Site Lead: coordination and supervision of on-site technical support team, task assignment, SLA tracking, and primary point of contact with the client
On-site technical support in enterprise-level mining operations: resolution of critical hardware, software and network incidents in 24/7 environment
